text: Figner Lidija Lidija Nikolaevna Figner (1853-1920), was a Russian revolutionary and a prominent member of the Narodniks. She was the sister of Vera Figner. == References == * V. N. Figner, Autobiografia, 1926, Dizionario enciclopedico Granat, v. 40. title: Lidija Figner
